mapper.insert: insert into cart(id, p_no, buydate, p_image, title, price, quantity) values(#{id}, #{p_no}, now(), #{p_image}, #{title}, #{price}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: update cart set quantity=quantity+#{quantity} where id=#{id} and p_no=#{p_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where id=#{id} and p_no=#{p_no}
